segments.text: What can I do for you , young man ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to rent three pairs of skates for the morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One pair of 37 , and two pairs of 21 . One for me , and the other two for two kids .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . And here are three crash helmets .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . Well , those two kids are beginners . What should I do about their safety ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , there are a lot to do , but nothing to worry about . First , make sure they don't go far from the railings .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yeah , maybe I should ask them just to walk along the railings .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a good idea . And remind them to be slow at the beginning , not to run into the railings .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Never go to the center of the lake . The ice there is too thin to skate on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Got it . Thanks for reminding me . And , are there any intensive training courses ?
segments.speaker: S2
